title: 7 Women and a Murder
short_cast: Margherita Buy, Ornella Vanoni, Micaela Ramazzotti, Sabrina Impacciatore, Luisa Ranieri, Diana Del Bufalo, Benedetta Porcaroli, Marco Rossetti

desc: When their family patriarch is stabbed, seven women, each with ulterior motives, become trapped together in a mansion to solve the puzzle of his murder.
